_sText:
NOTE: This map is ported from CS2 to CSS. For a better experience, I recommend trying the CS2 version.

A map designed specifically for the player named Pirim, featuring a total of 40 stages with a special decision point at Stage 10.

In Stage 10, players will face a choice:

Easy Stages: A total of 20 stages, designed to be more accessible and easier to complete. While they may take more time, they are less difficult and ideal for players who prefer a more relaxed experience.

Hard Stages: 10 stages that can be completed more quickly by skilled players, but they are much more challenging. These stages are perfect for those looking for a real test of their abilities and speedrunners!

This map can be enjoyed by players of all skill levels. Feel free to use it on servers.
If you have any suggestions or issues, feel free to leave a comment!
